response.overview: Megha 2, A Bishnupriya Manipuri Love story Feature Film, its a sequel of Megha the first movie with his wonderful acting performances earn everyone's kind attention and love, in this movie not only in India but also collects much love and huge fan supports from Bangladesh as well, its a turning point for every artists when all the particular Community starts Support and encourages that's the real treasure for every Artists. Each and everyone played very well in this movie nicely execute their character role which lead Megha2 a Blockbuster Movie. This movie story relates nowadays to many families must watch the movie with with your family completely a money worth Cinema.
response.title: Megha 2
